sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input type="file" id="file" ref="file" v-on:change="handleFileUpload()"/>
    <button v-on:click="submitFile()">Submit</button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'file-upload',
  data: () => {
    return {
      file: ''
    }
  },
  methods: {
    submitFile(){
      let formData = new FormData();
      formData.append('file', this.file);
      this.$http.post( 'http://localhost:3000/players',
          formData,
          {
          headers: {
              'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'
          }
        }
      ).then(function(){
          console.log('SUCCESS!!');
        })
        .catch(function(){
          console.log('FAILURE!!');
        });
      },

      handleFileUpload(){
        this.file = this.$refs.file.files[0];
      }
  }
}
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
button{
  padding: 5px 10px;
  color: white;
  background: blue;
}
</style>
